name: 甜花
text: ……にへへ
trans: ......Nihehe.

name: 甘奈
text:
甜花ちゃん、なんだかゴキゲンだねー☆
何見てるの？
trans:
You seem like you're in a good mood today.
Whatcha lookin' at?

name: 甘奈
text: あ、そのプリ、こないだみんなで撮ったやつだね！
trans: Oh, that's that picture we all took recently, right?

name: 甜花
text:
う、うん……どこに貼ろうって……ずっと、悩んでて……
ゲーム機に、貼ったんだ……
trans:
Y-Yeah...... Tenka didn't know... where to put it......
so she put it on... her game console......

name: 甘奈
text:
めっちゃ良く撮れてるよね～
甘奈もほら、スマホのケースに貼っちゃった☆
trans:
It looks super good～
I put mine in my phone case, look☆

name: 甜花
text:
にへへ……お揃い、だね……
あの時、楽しかったな……
trans:
Nihehe...... we match......
That was... so fun......

name: 甘奈
text:
じゃーん！
これが、甜花ちゃんの得意なゲームだよっ！
trans:
Ta-dah!
This is that game Tenka's super good at!

name: 千雪
text:
まあ……
これ、この銃で戦うゲームよね？
trans:
My......
You fight with these guns, right?

name: 甜花
text:
うん……
ゾンビを倒して……街を助けるんだ……
trans:
Yeah......
You take down zombies...... and save the city......

name: 甜花
text:
千雪さん……
こういうの……やったことある……？
trans:
Chiyuki-san......
Have you... played a game like this... before......?

name: 千雪
text:
ううん
難しそうだし、やったことはないわ
trans:
I haven't.
It seemed too difficult so I've never tried.

name: 甘奈
text:
ねえねえ甜花ちゃん、
甜花ちゃんのかっこいいとこ、千雪さんに見せちゃおうよ☆
trans:
Hey, Tenka-chan,
You should show her how cool you get☆

name: 甜花
text:
か、かっこいいなんて……
そんなこと……
trans: I-It's not... that cool......

name: 千雪
text: 私も、甜花ちゃんが得意なゲーム、見てみたいなぁ
trans: I wanna see you play something you're good at too.

name: 甜花
text:
じゃ、じゃあ、ちょっとだけ……
……あ、あのね……千雪さん……
trans:
A-Alright... maybe just a little......
......U-Um... Chiyuki-san......

name: 甜花
text:
これ……
ふたりで協力して……遊べるんだ……
trans:
We can......
We can play... together......

name: 甜花
text: その……千雪さんも……やってみる……？
trans: Do you wanna... give it a try...... Chiyuki-san......?

name: 千雪
text:
う、うん
でも私、甜花ちゃんの足を引っ張っちゃうかも……
trans:
S-Sure,
But I might step on your toes a little bit......

name: 甘奈
text:
大丈夫！　甜花ちゃん、めっちゃ上手だから！
甘奈も、ふたりがゲームしてるとこ見てみたいな～
trans:
It's okay! Tenka's great at this one! I wanna see you
two play too～

name: 甜花
text:
千雪さんが……危なくなったら……
甜花が守る、から……
trans:
Don't worry... if you're in danger... Chiyuki-san......
Tenka will... protect you......

name: 千雪
text:
じゃあ……やってみようかな
が、頑張ります……！
trans:
Alright... let's get started then.
I-I'll do what I can...!

name: 甜花
text: うん……！　一緒に、頑張ろ……！
trans: Yeah......! Let's get it... together......!

name: 甘奈
text:
わーっ、すごいよ千雪さん！
１発で急所に直撃だったね！
trans:
Woah, you're doing great, Chiyuki-san!
You hit that one right in its weak spot!

name: 千雪
text: ほんとう？　良かったぁ……！
trans:
Oh, did I?
Yay...!

name: 甜花
text: 千雪さん……リロード、忘れない……
trans: Don't forget... to reload...... Chiyuki-san......

name: 千雪
text: あっ、ごめんなさい！
trans: Oh, sorry!

name: 千雪
text: ……ふふっ
trans: ...Fufu.

name: 甘奈
text:
あっ、千雪さん！？
前来てるよっ、撃って撃って～！
trans:
Ah! Chiyuki-san!
There's one in front of you, shoot it! Shoot it!

name: 千雪
text: ええっ！？
trans: Huhhh!?

name: 千雪
text:
て、甜花ちゃん……
助けてくれてありがとう……！
trans: Th-Thanks for saving me... Tenka-chan...!

name: 甜花
text:
千雪さんは、守るから……
甜花に、お任せ……っ
trans:
Tenka will... protect you......
So... just leave it to her......

name: 千雪
text: わっ、すごい……
trans: Woah, you're amazing......

name: 甜花
text:
……ふぅ
これで全部、かな……
trans:
......Phew.
That should be... all of them......

name: 千雪
text: 甜花ちゃん、本当に上手ね……！
trans: You're amazing, Tenka-chan.....!

name: 甜花
text:
にへへ……
でも、まだまだ……これから……！
trans:
Nihehe......
But... she could be... a lot better too......!

name: 甘奈
text:
えへへ、ふたりともいい顔してる☆
それに甜花ちゃんは、いつもより……
trans:
Ehehe, you look like you two had a lot of fun☆
Tenka even moreso than...

name: 甘奈
text: ……あっ、千雪さん危ないっ！
trans: ...Ah! Chiyuki-san, watch out!

name: 千雪
text:
あぁ、ゲームオーバーになっちゃった……
ごめんね、甜花ちゃん……いっぱい助けてくれたのに
trans:
Aww, I got a game over...
Sorry, Tenka-chan... You had to save me a ton.

name: 甜花
text:
甜花こそ……
千雪さん、最後まで守れなかった……
trans:
It's Tenka's fault......
She couldn't protect you at the end......

name: 千雪
text:
そんな……気にしないで
甜花ちゃんのお陰で、すっごく楽しかったわ
trans:
Oh... Don't worry about that.
I had a ton of fun thanks to you.

name: 千雪
text:
……でも、甜花ちゃんひとりになっちゃった……
甜花ちゃんだけでも進められるの？
trans:
...But now you're on your own...
Are you able to do it by yourself?

name: 甜花
text:
うん……ここまで来れたら、
クリアまで、あとちょっとだから……
trans:
Yeah...... there's only a little more to go... until we
clear......

name: 甜花
text: 千雪さんの分も頑張ってみる……
trans: Tenka will... try to make up for it......

name: 千雪
text:
ありがとう……！
それじゃあ、甘奈ちゃんと一緒に見てるね
trans: Thank you...! I'll be watching with Amana-chan then.

name: 甘奈
text:
千雪さん、お疲れ様っ
ね、甜花ちゃんすごかったでしょっ？
trans: Good job, Chiyuki-san. Isn't Tenka-chan amazing?

name: 千雪
text:
うん、とっても頼もしかったわ
それに甜花ちゃんのお陰で、すごく楽しかった♪
trans:
Yeah, she was super reliable.
And I had a lot of fun thanks to her help♪

name: 甘奈
text: えへへ、それ聞いたら、きっと喜ぶよ☆
trans: Ehehe, I'm sure she'd be happy to hear you say that☆

name: 千雪
text:
甜花ちゃんがすごく楽しそうに遊ぶから
私も楽しい気持ちになれたの
trans:
She was having a ton of fun playing, so I had a lot of
fun too.

name: 千雪
text: きっと、本当にゲームが好きなのね
trans: She really does love games, doesn't she?

name: 甘奈
text:
うん☆
楽しそうにゲームしてる時の顔、甘奈も大好き！
trans:
Yeah☆ I just love the face she makes when she's
having fun in a game!

name: 甘奈
text:
あ……
でも、今日はいつもとちょっと違うかも？
trans:
Oh...
But... she seems a little different today.

name: 千雪
text:
……？
そうなの？
trans:
...?
Does she?

name: 甘奈
text:
うん！　今日の甜花ちゃん、いつもよりも
もっと楽しそうなんだー！
trans:
Yeah!
It looks like she's having even more fun than usual!

name: 甘奈
text: きっと、千雪さんと一緒に遊べたからじゃないかな？
trans: It's probably because she got to play with us.

name: 千雪
text:
そっか
……だとしたら嬉しいな
trans:
I see.
...Hearing that makes me a little happy.

name: 甜花
text:
やった……
クリアできた、よ……
trans:
Yes......!
Tenka cleared it......

name: 千雪
text: わぁ、おめでとう甜花ちゃん！
trans: Woah, congratulations, Tenka-chan!

name: 甘奈
text:
すごーい！　
今日はいつもよりもっと調子良いねっ！
trans:
Amazing!
You're on a roll today!

name: 甜花
text:
ち、千雪さんもいてくれたから……
いっぱい進めた……
trans:
Tenka could only... get this far because...
Chiyuki-san was here to help......

name: 千雪
text:
そんな……
……ありがとう、甜花ちゃん
trans:
Oh, I didn't do much...
Thank you for today, Tenka-chan.

name: 甘奈
text:
次はどのゲームやろっか？
今度は、甘奈も一緒にゲームしようかな～！
trans:
What game should we play next?
Maybe I should play with her too!

name: 千雪
text:
そうね……！　私ももっと甜花ちゃんに
色んなゲームを教えてもらいたいな
trans:
Good point...! I want her to teach me about tons of
games.

name: 甜花
text:
にへへ……えっと……
じゃあ、あっちのゲーム……
trans:
Nihehe...... Umm......
How about... that game over there......

name: 甘奈
text:
ふぅ……
たっくさん遊んだねー！
trans:
Phew......
We played a ton today!

name: 甜花
text:
うん……音ゲー……
前より上手くできたの、レッスンのお陰かな……？
trans:
Yeah...... Tenka's gotten a lot better... at rhythm
games...... maybe because of lessons......?

name: 甘奈
text:
ダンスゲームとかも良かったよねー！
みんなが甘奈たちのこと見てて、びっくりしちゃった☆
trans:
You were great at the dance games too!
Everyone was staring at you in awe☆

name: 千雪
text:
ふふっ、初めてやるゲームがいっぱいで
本当に楽しかったわ
trans:
Fufu, there were a ton of games I'd never played
before, it was so much fun.

name: 甘奈
text:
……そうだっ！
ねぇ、最後に一緒にプリ撮ろうよ！
trans: ...Right! Let's end the day with that picture booth!

name: 甜花
text:
い、良いかも……
千雪さんも……一緒に……
trans:
Th-That sounds fun......
Let's do it... with Chiyuki-san......

name: 千雪
text:
わぁっ
もちろん、みんなで撮りましょう♪
trans: Awww, sure, let's take a picture together♪

name: 甜花
text:
うん……
にへへ……みんなで……
trans:
Okay......
Nihehe...... We're all together......

name: 甘奈
text: じゃあ早速、レッツゴー☆
trans: Alright without any further ado, let's go☆

name: 甜花
text: ごー……！
